metadata.title: CVE-2020-15685 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
During the plaintext phase of the STARTTLS connection setup, protocolcommands could have been injected and evaluated within the encryptedsession. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:78.7.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:78.7.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:78.7.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:78.7.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:78.7.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:78.7.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.7.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
